overview: Blessed by the gods, with a handsome face and a noble physique, Johnny Brosnan sets out on his personal odyssey to conquer new worlds. Armed with a bit of luck, deception, and enough daring bravado, the young Adonis journeys to Greece, forging hot, sexual bonds and alliances and he endures a gang bang payback for his duplicity with a pantheon of god-like, sun-bronzed titans.
title: Out of Athens
